#ansible-vault encrypt ~/playbooks/secrets/passwords.yml
#Encryption successful

#cat ~/playbooks/secrets/passwords.yml
#$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
#31303637613331306664646564653431656537366239376336363636333961386337346133666365
#6536653536303530343439636430626361636339666261620a656330623663666433366635333365
#623634656463393435643563663830633937333037306235303838363239613837393761663730636137666136393461390a666261383336393632323563326232333731353362316334626564353764
#32663066326561316161663962323430306434373735623763396136653664383431303830366165
#3438303036623066333936356161336338656432616365386235

#ansible-vault view ~/playbooks/secrets/passwords.yml
#---
#admins: adm$n$
#developers: d3v3l0p3r


ansible-vault encrypt_string --stdin-name 'admin_pass'
Reading plaintext input from stdin. (ctrl-d to end input)
adm$n$admin_pass: !vault |
          $ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
          32666132323233363435623530336538363562303930656662363631353766643264393765646433

          6339623532353264320a323737646265373265366233366534376234363238396561656266626438
          3265
Encryption successful

ansible-vault encrypt_string --stdin-name 'developer_pass'
Reading plaintext input from stdin. (ctrl-d to end input)
d3v3l0p3rdeveloper_pass: !vault |
          $ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
          35393832663964376264306639373839386262643964623139633335643938313739373239633862
